title: My mastery emote isnt working
body:
Im pressing cntrl 6, but the mastery emote wont show up... Please help

{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Have you recently changed around your bindings?  It may have become unbound accidentally, but you can double check in-game via key bindings.  You can also try resetting them to default, but you'll have to redo any special bindings you might have.  Let me know if that helps.
